Eligibility Requirements for DIC
PL 108-183
also authorized the payment of DIC benefits at the full-dollar rate to survivors
whose DIC eligibility is based on the Veteran’s service in the
Commonwealth Army of the Philippines
Special Philippine Scouts, or
organized guerrilla groups, and
who meet the U.S. residency and citizenship requirements shown in
38 CFR 3.42
.
Reference
:  For more information on the half-dollar, or full dollar rates, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.A.2
and
B
.
